definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: ) renew, repair (poet. and late) (NH id., Ph. [[חדש]]; n. [[חדש]] new moon, also in [[קרתחדשת]] new-city = Carthage; Aram. h.adet and [[חַדֵּשׁ]]; Ar. h.da3a be new, Eth. h.adasa: 1. 2. renew; Sab. [[החדתַ]], v. Os (Levy):ZMG 1865, 204 Mordt:ZMG 1876, 30; As. [adâšu], uddiš, renew, eššu, new, etc. Dl:W 199 ff.)—

renew, make anew [[הַמְּלוּכָה]] 1Sa 11:14 (editorial); [[פני אדמה]] Ps 104:30, [[רוּחַ]] Ps 51:12 (‖[[בּרא]]); = bring back [[יׇמֵינוּ כְּקֶדֶם]] La 5:21; [[עדיך]] ´[[ח]] Job 10:17 i.e. bringest fresh (new) witnesses.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּתְחַדֵּשׁ]] c. pl. subj. [[כַּנֶּשֶׁר נְעוּרָָיְכִת]] ´[[ת]] Ps 103:5 thy youth reneweth itself, like the eagle.
